committee.description: Five expert AI agents collaborate like a professional trading desk to analyze every opportunity from multiple perspectives before making decisions.

benefits.technical: Technical Analysis specialist evaluates chart patterns and market signals

aiDecisions.title: Intelligent Decision Making
aiDecisions.description: Our AI doesn't just follow simple rules - it understands market context, remembers recent trades, and adapts to changing conditions in real-time.

benefits.contextAware: Remembers your trading history and avoids over-trading
benefits.adaptable: Adjusts strategy based on market volatility and conditions
benefits.learning: Continuously improves from market feedback and performance

temporalReasoning.description: Advanced algorithms analyze market sessions, liquidity patterns, and timing factors to execute trades at optimal moments.
